WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
BAHAMAS TO NOVA SCOTIA.
24 FOOT S/V MAX FLEX, WHITE HULL,
THREE PERSONS ON BOARD, UNREPORTED
BAHAMAS (25-04.00N 077-20.00W) TO
NOVA SCOTIA (44-39.06N 063-34.97W).
LAST KNOWN POSITION IN 40-27.98N 068-36.65W
AT 301700Z JUL. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC BOSTON, PHONE: 617 223 8555,
E-MAIL: RCCBOSTON@USCG.MIL.
